services.name: Inn Meal (hearty)
services.notes: Stew, bread, cheese, pint of ale.

services.name: Fire Tending (room service)
services.notes: Fire lit and kept through the evening.

services.name: Grooming (per animal)
services.notes: Brush, hoof check, mane and tail.

services.name: Tailoring: Fitting & Adjustments
services.notes: Precise fitting with pins and chalk.

services.name: Private Massage (luxury hour)
services.notes: Private room with oils and heated stones.

services.name: Hostel Bed (dormitory)
services.notes: Basic bunks; bring your own lock.

services.name: Stable: Feed Animals (per day)
services.notes: Hay and water at the rail.

services.name: Caravan Space (per day)
services.notes: Join a merchant caravan for safety.

services.name: Locksmith: New Key
services.notes: Key cut to an existing lock.

services.name: Greater Restoration
services.notes: Restores drained attributes or severe afflictions.

services.name: Revivify (fresh death)
services.notes: Within a minute of death; diamond required.

services.name: Teleportation Circle Access
services.notes: Licensed use of a permanent circle.

services.name: Sanctify/Consecrate Ground
services.notes: Wards a small site against corruption.

services.name: Pickpocket on Request
services.notes: Attempt to lift one small item.

services.name: Caravan Insurance (per week)
services.notes: Pays out on loss; terms apply.

services.name: Court Filing Fee
services.notes: Paid to the clerk of court.

services.name: Room Service Breakfast (Low Quality)
services.notes: Delivered at dawn with tea or coffee.

services.name: Room Service Breakfast (Standard Quality)
services.notes: Delivered at dawn with tea or coffee.

services.name: Room Service Breakfast (High Quality)
services.notes: Delivered at dawn with tea or coffee.
